channel.title: Project RealityPK --Read This--
channel.description:
Note: this may sound intense but it not im just starting a project and wanting a team (: Server Name : Reality-Pk Server revision : 562 (possibly loading 602-634 depending on good coder.)
ADMINS Main Owner - Me Co -owner - Content Developer(s) - Web Executive - Senior Promotion Manager -
Moderators GFX Executive - Junior Promotion Manager - Community Manager - Player Representative - Will be decided ingame
Information on Promotion
It would be nice if you had Runescape related Subscribers in which you will upload a video
about the server etc. Information on Owner/President
My names Tyler . I am 16, I come from Washington . I have coded RSPS's for
18-2 4months. I have run 1 pretty succesful servers over the time which has made me some profit
, but the thing that stops me from keep on going is that I had too much
work to do and had little help. I feel that this plan of mine has a great deal of
potential and within a few weeks we will have a massively succesful server.
Rewards
Once accepting your position, I will not lie, it will be hard work and tiresome.
But if you are mature and responsible and work hard, you will be given a bigger
percentage of profits. Not only will you recieve IRL money, you will be an
official in a most likely huge community.
Descriptions of Roles
ADMINS President - To overlook all operations of the corporation and to have the final
decision in all major updates. The CEO and Content Developer(s) will have a 1 hour
long discussions with the President weekly to discuss relevant topics. CO-Owner - To work with the Content Developers in terms of ideas. Will Supervise all
operations of the corporation in a lot of detail. Will work as a Accountant and
manage our funds.
Content Developer(s) - To proide weekly updates and fix bugs/glitches ASAP. Will
work closely with the CEO and Web Executive. Web Executive - To develop a good website with a forum and webclient. Must be
active for updates etc.
Senior Promotion Manager - Create weekly advertisement videos with help from the
Junior Promotion Manager, make Advertisements on RSPS Websites and any other ideas
of advertisements and promotions.
Administrator - To Permantely Ban/ Permantely Mute abusers and 'trouble makers'.
But will always give the person a clear warning and will use his instincts to act
fairly and firmly.
Moderators GFX Executive - To make banners, backgrounds, logos and Signatures. Does not
require much activity.
Community Manager - To orgainise community events, be helpful to new players
ingame and to set the example of being a good player. Must be active ingame.
Player Representative - Every 14 days, a vote will be held amongst the players to
decide who will represent their opinions infront of the admins. Players can
campaign on the forums and advertise ingame. The Player Representative will also
recieve trial Moderator Rank for those 14days.
Moderator - To report to the Administrator with names and evidence of 'trouble
makers'. Moderators will have the power to mute/ban if they feel it is extremely
urgent. Must be active ingame.
What is required to be a role
ADMINS CEO - Active, down to earth, intelligent, easy to work with, friendly, active. Content Developer(s) - Smart, past experience in coding, friendly, easy to work
with. Web Executive - Intelligent, past experience, easy to work with. Senior Promotion Manager - Good with editing and good ideas to promote the
server.
Moderators GFX Executive - Great with Logos, banners, backgrounds and signatures. Junior Promotion Manager - Same as Senior. Community Manager - Active, very friendly, well mannered and behaved, orgainized.
How long you work for (weekly)
CEO - 6-10hrs/week - easy work though. Content Developer(s) - 10+hrs/week - depends how fast you work and what updates we need etc. Web Executive - First week - 5-7hrs for building the site etc, 2-3hrs/week
afterwards for updates and moderating. Senior Promotion Manager - 4-5hrs/week.
Moderators GFX Executive - 1-2hrs/week Junior Promotion Manager - 3-4hrs/week. Community Manager - 3-5hrs/week Player Representative - 2hrs/week Can Be Spread Out Over The Week.
How to Apply
Add bulletz2011@live.com We'll talk it over Or come to my chat at :http://tinychat.com/bulletz2011 Or Message me on here.

item.title: Project RealityPK --Read This--
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

Project RealityPK --Read This--

This is going to fail, reason 1 : barely any real information, reason 2 : looked at how long you will work, reason 3 : your paying for staff.

Read full topic
